who_we_are_intro: A personal project created with the sole purpose of learning, connecting the sports community, and promoting responsible bib exchange.
who_we_are_paragraph_1: RunTrade is an individual, non-profit initiative driven by a passion for technology and a desire to contribute to the amateur sports world.
who_we_are_paragraph_2: The main goal is to make it easier for athletes to exchange bibs responsibly, helping those who couldn’t get a race entry in time, as well as those who, due to injury or lack of preparation, cannot participate.
who_we_are_paragraph_3: All exchanges should always respect the rules set by each organization or event, and whenever possible, be carried out through their official bib transfer mechanisms.
who_we_are_paragraph_4: We strongly recommend that bib prices do not exceed the original amount set by the event organizers, in order to prevent speculation and preserve the fair and sporting spirit of the competitions.
who_we_are_conclusion: This project is born from enthusiasm for sports, technology, and continuous learning — a small contribution to a more connected, supportive, and respectful community.
privacy_intro: At custom, we value privacy and transparency. This project is a personal, non-profit initiative created to facilitate the responsible exchange of race bibs between athletes.
privacy_data_text: We collect only the information necessary to provide our service, such as your name, email address, password, and optional profile data. We may also receive information when you contact us through the contact form.
privacy_use_text: Data is used solely to authenticate users, display published bib information, respond to inquiries, and improve the security and performance of the site.
privacy_share_text: We do not sell or share your data with third parties. Only essential technical services (such as hosting or email providers) are used, and they comply with data protection regulations.
privacy_security_text: We implement reasonable measures to protect your information, including password encryption and secure HTTPS connections.
privacy_rights_text: You can request the deletion or correction of your data from the 'My Profile' section of the app or by contacting us through the contact form.
privacy_cookies_text: We only use cookies necessary for the technical operation of the site, such as keeping your session active or remembering your language preference.
privacy_changes_text: This policy may be updated at any time. We encourage you to review it periodically.
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us through the contact form.
